mapper.insert: insert into placereview ( place_rev_id, place_id, rev_title, rev_content, rev_photo, rev_reg, rev_rate, rev_like, id, userphoto ) values ( place_review_seq.nextval, #{place_id}, #{rev_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rev_content}, #{rev_photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{rev_rate}, #{rev_like, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userphoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select count(place_rev_id) from placereview where place_id=#{place_id}
mapper.update: update placereview set rev_content=#{rev_content}, rev_rate=#{rev_rate}, rev_photo=#{rev_photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rev_reg=SYSDATE where place_rev_id=#{place_rev_id}
mapper.select: select round(avg(rev_rate),1) from placereview where place_id=#{place_id}
